arts.ttl: Serie A | Monza 2-1 Fiorentina: Match Report
arts.sum: Daniel Maldini emerged as a key player in Monza's 2-1 victory over Fiorentina on Monday night, helping to keep the team's hopes alive in the Serie A. This match marked Monza's second win of the season and the first under new head coach Salvatore Bocchetti. The post Serie A | Monza 2-1 Fiorentina: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.sum: As Fiorentina prepare to face Monza on Monday evening, the Viola find themselves in a strong position with a fully available squad. The team's recent acquisition, Michael Folorunsho, who joined on loan from Napoli, is expected to be in contention for his debut. arts.ttl: Monza vs Fiorentina to close out Matchday 20
arts.sum: Monza have lost their last five championship games, the Brianza team have never recorded six defeats in a row in Serie A (also five in the first five games ever in the top flight, between August and September 2022). Before moving to Fiorentina, Raffaele Palladino coached Monza in 70 Serie A matches (25W, 21D, 24L), including the Brianza team`s first ever victory in the top flight, 1-0 on 18 September 2022 against Juventus (his debut on the bench in Serie A).

arts.ttl: Serie A | Monza v Fiorentina: Match Preview
arts.sum: As Serie A action resumes following the winter break, Fiorentina travel to the U-Power Stadium on Monday evening, seeking to revive their faltering campaign against bottom-placed Monza. This clash presents an opportunity for the Viola to regain their footing in the race for European qualification, while the hosts desperately search for a lifeline in their battle against relegation. The post Serie A | Monza v Fiorentina: Match Preview appeared first on FootItalia.com.
